statements: DELETE FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE player_id = 100 AND accuracy > 0.8;
DELETE FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE win_loss_ratio < 1.0 AND player_name LIKE 'A%';
DELETE FROM PlayerMetrics WHERE player_id = 1 AND win_loss_ratio > 2.0;
DELETE FROM MatchResults WHERE match_id = 100 AND player_id = 10;
DELETE FROM MatchHistory WHERE player_id = 2002 AND result = 'Victory';
DELETE FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 100 AND weapon_id = 1;
